text: @NC_Governor @cooperchip1 You are in the wrong if YOU follow THEIR rules for CDC safe reopening or distancing & you are wrong if YOU disavow those rules & reignite the Coronavirus outbreak to allow THEM to break them. You made the smartest decision possible for the safety and health of your constituents.
